description: Demolition of existing building and erection of 7 storey building plus basement to accomodate 87 residential units (Use class C3) and 564 sq.m of offices (Use Class B1) on part of ground floor with associated public realm and incidental works.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this decision.
status: Called in by Secretary of State
decision: Called in by Secretary of State
